character_skills.localised_description: Almost every tribe or warband in the shadow of the Middle Mountains contains a few dozen of Ghorros' many thousand relatives, and he is something of a legend amongst his people.
Imbued with the quiddity of Ruin, Taurox blah
The Minotaur Lord's blood-lust isinfectious, driving any other thought from the mind.

It is commonly said that Ghorros Warhoof is the father of a thousand young, and yet that still does not do his exploits justice. A menagerie of twisted terrors that cover the Old World from one end to the other share his bloodline. Ghorros frequently boasts about his adventures; indeed it is very difficult to get him to stop. Amongst his many claims is the fathering of the entire Centigor race. He maintains that every one of that mismatched and drunken clan can be traced back to his lineage. Few have the nerve to gainsay him, for in his cups the Warhoof has a terrible and violent temper, and he is rarely sober.

Taurox the Brass Bull is an unstoppable force; aroaring, snorting engine of destruction virtuallyimpervious to physical harm. Cast in the form of agrotesquely muscled Doombull, Taurox looms over hisfollowers, a mountain of living brass with curving,bladed horns and a gnashing metal maw that constantlydrools with gore.

"I set down my lance, symbol of duty
I spurn those whom I love

I give my body, heart and soul to the Lady whom I seek..."

character_skills.localised_description: What ingenious technological advance is this, that affords Imperial artillerists more and better ammunition with which to smite Karl Franz's enemies?

localised_description.last_approved_text: Gelt's modifications of the Emperor's special weapons - giving them twice the power than previously thought possible - has increased their effectiveness and resistance to attack.

character_skills.localised_description: Gelt's modifications of the Emperor's special weapons - giving them twice the power than previously thought possible - has increased their effectiveness and resistance to attack.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Possessed of a fierce intelligence and remarkable magical skills, the youngest Wizard ever to become Patriarch of the Gold College is known - and feared - throughout the land.

character_skills.localised_description: Possessed of a fierce intelligence and remarkable magical skills, the youngest Wizard ever to become Patriarch of the Gold College is known - and feared - throughout the land.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is no one known to possess greater knowledge in alchemical matters than Balthasar Gelt, so great is his understanding of the mystical Lore of Metal.

character_skills.localised_description: There is no one known to possess greater knowledge in alchemical matters than Balthasar Gelt, so great is his understanding of the mystical Lore of Metal.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "If we die, we will die wielding our swords, for there is no better death for a warrior."

character_skills.localised_description: "If we die, we will die wielding our swords, for there is no better death for a warrior."

localised_description.last_approved_text: Karl Franz has been hailed as an innovative tactician and a valiant general. Only the bravest and best among the Reiksguard may fight at his side.

character_skills.localised_description: Karl Franz has been hailed as an innovative tactician and a valiant general. Only the bravest and best among the Reiksguard may fight at his side.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Followers of the Emperor are inspired by his presence to attain levels of excellence in swordsmanship and personal loyalty they never thought possible.

character_skills.localised_description: Followers of the Emperor are inspired by his presence to attain levels of excellence in swordsmanship and personal loyalty they never thought possible.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "We will sit at Sigmar's banquet like the heroes of old and our names will be remembered in our people's songs until the end of time!"

character_skills.localised_description: "We will sit at Sigmar's banquet like the heroes of old and our names will be remembered in our people's songs until the end of time!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: Thanks to Karl Franz's tireless efforts on behalf of his people, the Empire has flourished during his reign as never before.

character_skills.localised_description: Thanks to Karl Franz's tireless efforts on behalf of his people, the Empire has flourished during his reign as never before.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Although Karl Franz walks a path many have trodden before, few - if any - have done so with such perfection and grace.

character_skills.localised_description: Although Karl Franz walks a path many have trodden before, few - if any - have done so with such perfection and grace.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Held aloft and kept there by the rampant lunacy of their leader, Azhag's forces are all the stronger for his insane presence.

character_skills.localised_description: Held aloft and kept there by the rampant lunacy of their leader, Azhag's forces are all the stronger for his insane presence.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "Stoopid gits, I sed NOWWWWW!!!!!!!"

character_skills.localised_description: "Stoopid gits, I sed NOWWWWW!!!!!!!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: Azhag's mysterious crown whispers fell plans and dastardly schemes; sometimes he understands them and passes the general gist to the Shamans in his army.

character_skills.localised_description: Azhag's mysterious crown whispers fell plans and dastardly schemes; sometimes he understands them and passes the general gist to the Shamans in his army.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There are some who whisper that the Slaughterer's wild schemes are not sufficiently Orcy. Needless to say, the crown normally lets him know so he can weed out the dissenters.

character_skills.localised_description: There are some who whisper that the Slaughterer's wild schemes are not sufficiently Orcy. Needless to say, the crown normally lets him know so he can weed out the dissenters.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Enchanted armour and weapons, and the influence of the crown, allows Azhag to 'let go' somewhat on the battlefield!

character_skills.localised_description: Enchanted armour and weapons, and the influence of the crown, allows Azhag to 'let go' somewhat on the battlefield!

localised_description.last_approved_text: When the crown takes control Azhag falls into a trance, his eyes cloud over and he mutters and even argues with himself…

character_skills.localised_description: When the crown takes control Azhag falls into a trance, his eyes cloud over and he mutters and even argues with himself…

localised_description.last_approved_text: “We’re simply da best! Betta than orl da rest!”

character_skills.localised_description: “We’re simply da best! Betta than orl da rest!”

localised_description.last_approved_text: When a Black Orc’s not-inconsiderable dander is up, you definitely *don’t* want to get in his way!

character_skills.localised_description: When a Black Orc’s not-inconsiderable dander is up, you definitely *don’t* want to get in his way!

localised_description.last_approved_text: "Grimgor is bigger 'n' 'arder 'n' betta than orl yoo uvver gits!!!"

character_skills.localised_description: "Grimgor is bigger 'n' 'arder 'n' betta than orl yoo uvver gits!!!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: Black Orcs are the biggest, strongest, meanest, and most brutal of all Greenskins. Even by those standards, Grimgor is big, strong, mean, and brutal!

character_skills.localised_description: Black Orcs are the biggest, strongest, meanest, and most brutal of all Greenskins. Even by those standards, Grimgor is big, strong, mean, and brutal!

localised_description.last_approved_text: "Yoo just pop a couple under yer tongue and 'bosh', everyfing in yer way gets a right royal twattin'!"

character_skills.localised_description: "Yoo just pop a couple under yer tongue and 'bosh', everyfing in yer way gets a right royal twattin'!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: Considering he is a complete and utter git, Grimgor's leadership, personal bravery and combat prowess are more than impressive.

character_skills.localised_description: Considering he is a complete and utter git, Grimgor's leadership, personal bravery and combat prowess are more than impressive.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The weight of every single insult, grievance, umbrage and ill-feeling, channelled into a single, crushing swing of the axe.

character_skills.localised_description: The weight of every single insult, grievance, umbrage and ill-feeling, channelled into a single, crushing swing of the axe.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It's a crazy piece of acrobatics, for sure, but it might just work; if it does, Ungrim's opponent has no chance.

character_skills.localised_description: It's a crazy piece of acrobatics, for sure, but it might just work; if it does, Ungrim's opponent has no chance.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "Come back here, you cowardly piece of green filth and take what's coming to you!"

character_skills.localised_description: "Come back here, you cowardly piece of green filth and take what's coming to you!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: "I thought I killed you already! Back for some more? Take that!"

character_skills.localised_description: "I thought I killed you already! Back for some more? Take that!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: "I'm not afraid of you - my beloved Ancestors are older and wiser than your dark, uncaring deities!"

character_skills.localised_description: "I'm not afraid of you - my beloved Ancestors are older and wiser than your dark, uncaring deities!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: Those who take up the mantle of Slayer are steeled for the fight and enjoy Valaya's blessings and protection.

character_skills.localised_description: Those who take up the mantle of Slayer are steeled for the fight and enjoy Valaya's blessings and protection.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Those bound by Necromancy eventually degrade and fall. Krell, however, as Kemmler's chosen, has been afforded more time with which to kill in the Lichemaster’s name.

character_skills.localised_description: Those bound by Necromancy eventually degrade and fall. Krell, however, as Kemmler's chosen, has been afforded more time with which to kill in the Lichemaster’s name.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Having forever escaped the shackles of mortality with Kemmler's magical assistance, Krell will never stop - he'll keep coming back until they're all *very* dead!

character_skills.localised_description: Having forever escaped the shackles of mortality with Kemmler's magical assistance, Krell will never stop - he'll keep coming back until they're all *very* dead!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Life without end; destruction without pause. Excellent!

character_skills.localised_description: Life without end; destruction without pause. Excellent!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The bite of this obsidian blade leaves behind Unliving shards that eat their way through the flesh to its victim’s heart.

character_skills.localised_description: The bite of this obsidian blade leaves behind Unliving shards that eat their way through the flesh to its victim’s heart.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Strengthened by the ages and Kemmler's necromancy, Krell's Chaos-infused plate armour protects him from degrading as other bound-entities eventually must do.

character_skills.localised_description: Strengthened by the ages and Kemmler's necromancy, Krell's Chaos-infused plate armour protects him from degrading as other bound-entities eventually must do.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "And I'll lead you all in the dance," said he - the relentless dance of the tireless Undead hordes.

character_skills.localised_description: "And I'll lead you all in the dance," said he - the relentless dance of the tireless Undead hordes.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "Come to my side, my Undead servants. Now, you are bound, irrevocably, to my will forever!"

character_skills.localised_description: "Come to my side, my Undead servants. Now, you are bound, irrevocably, to my will forever!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: "The time to strike is now!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: Never trap this one, when cornered they have nothing left to lose.

character_skills.localised_description: Never trap this one, when cornered they have nothing left to lose.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.

character_skills.localised_description: The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!

character_skills.localised_description: This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…

character_skills.localised_description: Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…

localised_description.last_approved_text: Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!

character_skills.localised_description: Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!

localised_description.last_approved_text: "I spy with my beady eye… something that needs to be killed."

character_skills.localised_description: "I spy with my beady eye… something that needs to be killed."

localised_description.last_approved_text: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud - these are the things that sustain me."

localised_description.last_approved_text: From the verdant depths, the Lady rises to protect the faithful.

character_skills.localised_description: From the verdant depths, the Lady rises to protect the faithful.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The finest horses in the Old World, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament, barded for further protection.

character_skills.localised_description: The finest horses in the Old World, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament, barded for further protection.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Stronger and faster than the mightiest warhorse, these intelligent beasts are exceptionally loyal to their noble masters.

character_skills.localised_description: Stronger and faster than the mightiest warhorse, these intelligent beasts are exceptionally loyal to their noble masters.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Thorough drilling increases the peasants' chances of withstanding the horrors of battle.

character_skills.localised_description: Thorough drilling increases the peasants' chances of withstanding the horrors of battle.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "Thou shalt be everywhere and always the champion of the Right and the Good against Injustice and Evil."

localised_description.last_approved_text: Although nothing can replace the thrill of the charge and the righteous clash of steel, seriously heavy artillery generally helps.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The bloodline of the noblest of all steeds has been preserved; it serves us still.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Like the lion, this one is the biggest and the bravest of his kind... with the sharpest teeth.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Even stupid peasants can learn to stand fast and brace against the charge.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The greatest of the hippogryphs for the greatest Bretonnian leader since Gilles the Uniter.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "You will be the land, and the land will be you. If you fail, the land will perish."

character_skills.localised_description: "You will be the land, and the land will be you. If you fail, the land will perish."

localised_description.last_approved_text: Stronger and faster than the mightiest warhorse, these intelligent beasts are exceptionally loyal to their noble masters.

character_skills.localised_description: Stronger and faster than the mightiest warhorse, these intelligent beasts are exceptionally loyal to their noble masters.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "The king without a sword? The land without a king!"

character_skills.localised_description: "The king without a sword? The land without a king!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: So great must the king's stature be that when battle is joined it is always with the Lady's blessing.

character_skills.localised_description: So great must the king's stature be that when battle is joined it is always with the Lady's blessing.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Lady's blessing is a wondrous gift freely graced upon all Bretonnian subjects, should they but kneel and utter their devotion.

character_skills.localised_description: The Lady's blessing is a wondrous gift freely graced upon all Bretonnian subjects, should they but kneel and utter their devotion.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Acolytes too are blessed by the Lady's spirit, enabling them to resist magical attacks.

character_skills.localised_description: Acolytes too are blessed by the Lady's spirit, enabling them to resist magical attacks.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The finest horses in the Old World, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament.

character_skills.localised_description: The finest horses in the Old World, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

character_skills.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

character_skills.localised_description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The horses of Chaos live for battle and will choose to graze on bones over grass.

character_skills.localised_description: The horses of Chaos live for battle and will choose to graze on bones over grass.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The roar of a Manticore is guaranteed to send mortals fleeing, for they know a creature of terror is abroad.

character_skills.localised_description: The roar of a Manticore is guaranteed to send mortals fleeing, for they know a creature of terror is abroad.

localised_description.last_approved_text: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

character_skills.localised_description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

character_skills.localised_description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Doomfire is a gift from Khorne, to ensure the Hellcannons speak with extra fury.

character_skills.localised_description: Doomfire is a gift from Khorne, to ensure the Hellcannons speak with extra fury.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Mutations awarded by the Chaos Gods to their followers may look horrific to southerners, but such gifts are prized.

character_skills.localised_description: Mutations awarded by the Chaos Gods to their followers may look horrific to southerners, but such gifts are prized.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.

character_skills.localised_description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The legions march forth under the Lord's inscrutable gaze, eager to kill for fear of his wrath.

character_skills.localised_description: The legions march forth under the Lord's inscrutable gaze, eager to kill for fear of his wrath.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Chaos Lord expects his charioteers to harvest many souls for the consumption of the Dark Powers.

character_skills.localised_description: This Chaos Lord expects his charioteers to harvest many souls for the consumption of the Dark Powers.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Knights of Chaos are a boon for any Lord ready to despoil, for that is the will of the Dark Gods.

character_skills.localised_description: The Knights of Chaos are a boon for any Lord ready to despoil, for that is the will of the Dark Gods.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

character_skills.localised_description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

localised_description.last_approved_text: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption - as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

character_skills.localised_description: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption - as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dark Apothecaries mix their fell unguents, ensuring those that can continue to serve.

character_skills.localised_description: The Dark Apothecaries mix their fell unguents, ensuring those that can continue to serve.

localised_description.last_approved_text: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

character_skills.localised_description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The masses flock to the Lord of Chaos - a dread time will soon fall on the weaklings in the south.

character_skills.localised_description: The masses flock to the Lord of Chaos - a dread time will soon fall on the weaklings in the south.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

character_skills.localised_description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

character_skills.localised_description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Lord that was once part of the tribes - one who rode the great Norscan migrations - can summon his kin.

character_skills.localised_description: A Lord that was once part of the tribes - one who rode the great Norscan migrations - can summon his kin.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

character_skills.localised_description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

character_skills.localised_description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "I am no god's tool, yet I am Chosen, for there is no other that thirsts for the end as much as I."

character_skills.localised_description: "I am no god's tool, yet I am Chosen, for there is no other that thirsts for the end as much as I."

localised_description.last_approved_text: Dorghar is the Steed of the Apocalypse, a gift from the Chaos Gods themselves to their ultimate champion.

character_skills.localised_description: Dorghar is the Steed of the Apocalypse, a gift from the Chaos Gods themselves to their ultimate champion.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Archaon is Lord of the End Times, crowned by Be'lakor, a creature of abeyance that's neither shape nor shadow.

character_skills.localised_description: Engineers use number-lore to work out the best trajectories and prime killing arcs for their war machines.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Lord and his az are never separated, for it is as much part of him as his beard.

character_skills.localised_description: A Lord and his az are never separated, for it is as much part of him as his beard.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Full of grim determination, when Dwarfs join battle there is no retreat, only victory or death.

character_skills.localised_description: Full of grim determination, when Dwarfs join battle there is no retreat, only victory or death.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A true Lord knows the Underway, his Dwarfhold and how to fight under the ground better than anyone.

character_skills.localised_description: A true Lord knows the Underway, his Dwarfhold and how to fight under the ground better than anyone.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This stubborn Dwarf refuses to yield or tire, and ensures his followers are of the same ilk.

character_skills.localised_description: This stubborn Dwarf refuses to yield or tire, and ensures his followers are of the same ilk.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Dwarfs are long-lived with many years of battlefield experience, making them excellent tacticians.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Lord knows his throng thrives in ranged combat and expects his Clansdwarfs to excel in that discipline.

character_skills.localised_description: This Lord knows his throng thrives in ranged combat and expects his Clansdwarfs to excel in that discipline.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "All Dwarfs to me! We have grudges to settle - Grimnir demands it!"

character_skills.localised_description: "All Dwarfs to me! We have grudges to settle - Grimnir demands it!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: Bigga choppas are more hurty - that’s a well-known Orc-fact and one this Boss eulogises. So his lads are all about hefty choppas.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A master of the feint and riposte, this Knight's skill at turning an enemy's strength against them is legendary.

character_skills.localised_description: A master of the feint and riposte, this Knight's skill at turning an enemy's strength against them is legendary.

character_skills.localised_description: No matter the odds, this Knight takes to the field utterly undaunted by the numberless hordes of his enemies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Knight's skill, prowess, and finesse with blade and lance are beyond compare; his bravery, horsemanship, and chivalry above all others.

character_skills.localised_description: This Knight's skill, prowess, and finesse with blade and lance are beyond compare; his bravery, horsemanship, and chivalry above all others.

localised_description.last_approved_text: In the glory of the charge is this Knight most alive, ever in the forefront of battle.

character_skills.localised_description: In the glory of the charge is this Knight most alive, ever in the forefront of battle.

localised_description.last_approved_text: So great is this Knight's skill with a lance that none can unhorse them.

localised_description.last_approved_text: With a heart of stone and resolute temper this Knight stands unbowed, spilling the foe's blood with each sweep and thrust.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Knight has great contempt for those who eschew the martial values of meeting one's opponent face to face.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A hermit-Knight, this one nevertheless always returns to fight for his beloved king.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "I will be the axis upon which the wheel of change turns, and the world will drown in the light of unborn stars."

character_skills.localised_description: "I will be the axis upon which the wheel of change turns, and the world will drown in the light of unborn stars."

localised_description.last_approved_text: "The whole world will burn before I rest again."

character_skills.localised_description: "The whole world will burn before I rest again."

localised_description.last_approved_text: "Surely such sedition should sour and succumb to Sigvald!"

character_skills.localised_description: "Surely such sedition should sour and succumb to Sigvald!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: "This is my edict as High King! Khazukan Kazakit-ha!"

character_skills.localised_description: "This is my edict as High King! Khazukan Kazakit-ha!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: "Bring me victory, bring me death!"

character_skills.localised_description: "Bring me victory, bring me death!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: "The Wind of Chamon will rise and blast any who get in my way!"

character_skills.localised_description: "The Wind of Chamon will rise and blast any who get in my way!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: "Our names will be remembered in our people's songs until the end of time!"

character_skills.localised_description: "Our names will be remembered in our people's songs until the end of time!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: "Wyverns is good fer one thing, eatin', smashin', smellin' and flyin'."

character_skills.localised_description: "Wyverns is good fer one thing, eatin', smashin', smellin' and flyin'."

localised_description.last_approved_text: "Everyfing I see is mine."

character_skills.localised_description: "Everyfing I see is mine."

localised_description.last_approved_text: "You and your masters are desiccated relics of a dead age."

character_skills.localised_description: "You and your masters are desiccated relics of a dead age."

localised_description.last_approved_text: "My people will feast on your bones."

character_skills.localised_description: "My people will feast on your bones."

localised_description.last_approved_text: The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

character_skills.localised_description: The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.

character_skills.localised_description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.

character_skills.localised_description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "I am mighty, none dare challenge me!"

character_skills.localised_description: "I am mighty, none dare challenge me!"

character_skills.localised_description: The Lord howls out into the night, and is answered by the baying of dark creatures.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A dark pact has been made with darker Gods to guarantee victory.

character_skills.localised_description: A dark pact has been made with darker Gods to guarantee victory.

character_skills.localised_description: This Lord has endless forbearance, a timeless patience crafted over millennia.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Hellsteeds are winged Nightmares. Mannfred may ride such an impressive creature to the horror of his foes.

character_skills.localised_description: Hellsteeds are winged Nightmares. Mannfred may ride such an impressive creature to the horror of his foes.

localised_description.last_approved_text: None know better the secrets of Shyish, the Wind of Death, than those who have mastered its Lore.

character_skills.localised_description: None know better the secrets of Shyish, the Wind of Death, than those who have mastered its Lore.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The corpse of a Dragon born aloft on tattered wings and evil sorcery - a fitting mount for the Lord of Vampires.

character_skills.localised_description: The corpse of a Dragon born aloft on tattered wings and evil sorcery - a fitting mount for the Lord of Vampires.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is not just Vampires that can tame a fierce, barded Undead steed - some Necromancers have such power too.

character_skills.localised_description: It is not just Vampires that can tame a fierce, barded Undead steed - some Necromancers have such power too.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Necromancers may summon a Hellsteed, a winged Nightmare, to take them wherever they wish.

character_skills.localised_description: Necromancers may summon a Hellsteed, a winged Nightmare, to take them wherever they wish.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The most impressive Nightmares are those reared on fresh blood. Such noble monstrosities are worthy mounts.

character_skills.localised_description: The most impressive Nightmares are those reared on fresh blood. Such noble monstrosities are worthy mounts.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "To me, my winged steed of bone and flesh; let us fly and remake the world together!"

character_skills.localised_description: "To me, my winged steed of bone and flesh; let us fly and remake the world together!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is to the Plain of Bones that a Vampire Lord travels to claim a Zombie Dragon as their mount.

character_skills.localised_description: It is to the Plain of Bones that a Vampire Lord travels to claim a Zombie Dragon as their mount.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The wails of a Banshee can be lethal and strike terror into the hearts of any who hear them.

character_skills.localised_description: The wails of a Banshee can be lethal and strike terror into the hearts of any who hear them.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Necromancer that can summon a Nightmare is no amateur in the black arts.

character_skills.localised_description: A Necromancer that can summon a Nightmare is no amateur in the black arts.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Replicated by Runesmiths from a single scale wedged between the teeth of a slain Chaos Lord at the pivotal Battle of Thraag, the White Dwarf's armour is able to deflect even the hardest blows.

character_skills.localised_description: Replicated by Runesmiths from a single scale wedged between the teeth of a slain Chaos Lord at the pivotal Battle of Thraag, the White Dwarf's armour is able to deflect even the hardest blows.

localised_description.last_approved_text: When Grombrindal musters the throngs, Dawi from leagues around will come to honour and fight for the living Ancestor.

character_skills.localised_description: When Grombrindal musters the throngs, Dawi from leagues around will come to honour and fight for the living Ancestor.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Grombrindal’s lustrous white beard is the envy of many a Dwarf. Such fine whiskers can transfix and befuddle any foe!

character_skills.localised_description: Grombrindal’s lustrous white beard is the envy of many a Dwarf. Such fine whiskers can transfix and befuddle any foe!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.

character_skills.localised_description: Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You some kind of bearded Elf or a true Dawi? That’s just a scratch, get up!”

character_skills.localised_description: You some kind of bearded Elf or a true Dawi? That’s just a scratch, get up!”

localised_description.last_approved_text: Grombrindal's cloak was woven by Valaya herself as a token of the love she felt for the White Dwarf, as proven by the skill in needlework displayed.

character_skills.localised_description: Grombrindal's cloak was woven by Valaya herself as a token of the love she felt for the White Dwarf, as proven by the skill in needlework displayed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is the Age of Reckoning; the Ancestor gods must act now for the good of the Karaz Ankor.

character_skills.localised_description: It is the Age of Reckoning; the Ancestor gods must act now for the good of the Karaz Ankor.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Few have lived as long as the White Dwarf. Can any Dawi, umgi or even elgi rival such experience?

character_skills.localised_description: Few have lived as long as the White Dwarf. Can any Dawi, umgi or even elgi rival such experience?

localised_description.last_approved_text: "The time to strike is now!"

character_skills.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: While all Dwarfs are relentless in their goals – never slowing or slouching – Grombrindal’s determination is on another level altogether.

character_skills.localised_description: While all Dwarfs are relentless in their goals – never slowing or slouching – Grombrindal’s determination is on another level altogether.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Long thought lost to time and conflict, Grombrindal's awesome helm inspires already-courageous Dwarfen hearts to even greater acts of bravery.

character_skills.localised_description: Long thought lost to time and conflict, Grombrindal's awesome helm inspires already-courageous Dwarfen hearts to even greater acts of bravery.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Mentioned in several sagas and legends, could the White Dwarf's mighty weapon be the fabled rune axe wielded by Grimnir at the dawn of history?

character_skills.localised_description: Mentioned in several sagas and legends, could the White Dwarf's mighty weapon be the fabled rune axe wielded by Grimnir at the dawn of history?

localised_description.last_approved_text: Once the forges burn, under the protection of a living Ancestor, the Guilds put their folk to work. Riches quickly follow.

character_skills.localised_description: Once the forges burn, under the protection of a living Ancestor, the Guilds put their folk to work. Riches quickly follow.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "You and your followers will die - that is my oath as my kin, Grimnir, is witness!"

character_skills.localised_description: "You and your followers will die - that is my oath as my kin, Grimnir, is witness!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Undead whole is always stronger than the sum of its parts.

character_skills.localised_description: The Undead whole is always stronger than the sum of its parts.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Nocturnal spectres hiding from the light, addicted to your blood.

character_skills.localised_description: Nocturnal spectres hiding from the light, addicted to your blood.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Evil takes flight; blotting out the moon on blackened wings, calling us to the dance…

character_skills.localised_description: Evil takes flight; blotting out the moon on blackened wings, calling us to the dance…

localised_description.last_approved_text: The darkness within us all, given free rein to lust and gorge eternally.

character_skills.localised_description: The darkness within us all, given free rein to lust and gorge eternally.

localised_description.last_approved_text: “Rise, my friends, rise. Flesh and blood has its place, but spirit is the prize valued above all other.”

character_skills.localised_description: “Rise, my friends, rise. Flesh and blood has its place, but spirit is the prize valued above all other.”

localised_description.last_approved_text: The life essence of many wretched, innocent smallfolk ensures that those who drink from this cursed cup thrive with newfound power.
